1.title: Consultation

access.title: Smart Access Control
access.desc: End-to-end access management from main warehouse entry to secure internal zones, ensuring safety and compliance.

1.title: Smart Entry Solutions
items: Mobile App / Bluetooth: Contactless entry via phone, enabling remote authorization for management.
Key Cards / Fobs: Stable and cost-effective solution for large-scale employee access.
Biometric / Pin Pad: Dual-authentication for high-security areas like server rooms or finance offices.
Visitor Codes: Temporary time-bound access codes for interviewees or maintenance contractors.

2.title: Hardware Installation
items: Maglocks / Electric Strikes: Customized installation for glass, fire, or roll-up doors.
Request-to-Exit (RTE): Ensures rapid evacuation during power outages or emergencies.
Smart Intercoms: One-touch calling for visitors with remote unlock via mobile or indoor stations.

3.title: Cloud Management
items: Remote Authorization: Grant permissions to US employees instantly from anywhere in the world.
Access Logs: Export detailed reports on who entered where and when.
Door Ajar Alerts: Instant mobile notifications if a door is left open for too long.

4.title: Compliance & Maintenance
items: Fire Alarm Integration: Automatic door release upon fire alarm trigger for life safety compliance.
Licensed Installation: Strict adherence to local US electrical codes.
Emergency Repair: Local team support for urgent access control failures.

ev.title: AGV / EV Charging Solutions
ev.desc: One-stop solution for robotics and EV energy replenishment, from power planning to government permitting.

1.title: Site Assessment & Planning
items: Power Load Analysis: Evaluate transformer capacity to prevent overload from new charging stations.
Site Selection: Optimize charger layout based on traffic flow and building/grid constraints.
Capacity Upgrades: Design and coordination with utility companies for transformer upgrades if needed.

2.title: Professional Installation
items: Multi-Type Installation: Support for Level 2 AC and DC Fast Charging stations across various brands.
Trenching & Conduit: Underground hard conduit laying and wiring strictly following US standards.
Safety & Signage: Installation of protective bollards and designated parking stencils for insurance compliance.

3.title: Permitting & Compliance
items: Permit Acquisition: Submission of electrical diagrams to the City for official construction permits.
Fire & Safety Inspection: Ensuring installation meets fire codes and passing final government inspections.

4.title: Smart Operations
items: Management Software: Real-time dashboard for usage monitoring, energy consumption, and billing.
Safety Patrols: Regular checks on charging guns, cables, and GFI protection devices.

wifi.title: Industrial Wi-Fi Coverage
wifi.desc: Specialized optimization for high-ceiling warehouses and complex metal interference environments.

1.title: Site Survey & Design
items: Heatmap Simulation: Professional software simulation to ensure full signal coverage in every aisle.
Interference Avoidance: Detects and avoids interference from machinery, microwaves, or neighboring networks.

2.title: Industrial Hardware
items: High-Bay Coverage: Directional antenna technology to overcome signal shielding from metal racking.
Industrial APs: Anti-static, temperature-resistant, and durable wireless access points.
Seamless Roaming: Zero-packet-loss roaming for forklifts and scanners moving between APs.

3.title: Security & Managment
items: Network Isolation: Separate VLANs for office, scanners, and guests to secure corporate data.
Device Monitoring: Real-time status tracking of all scanners/PDAs with instant failure detection.
Remote Tuning: Remote configuration and optimization capabilities to minimize on-site visits.

4.title: Warehouse Scenarios
items: Outdoor Coverage: High-power weatherproof Wi-Fi for loading docks and yards.
Device Compatibility: Tuning for major scanner brands (Zebra, Honeywell) to resolve connectivity freezes.

cctv.title: HD Surveillance & AI Security
cctv.desc: Immersive remote monitoring to protect your US assets from anywhere in the world.

1.title: Full Scenario Deployment
items: Zero Blind Spots: Strategic camera placement for racking, entrances, and loading docks.
Industrial Hardware: 4K HD, Starlight Night Vision, and WDR cameras for clear images in all lighting conditions.
Ruggedized Outdoor Units: Vandal-proof and weather-resistant cameras for all climates.

2.title: AI Intelligence
items: Perimeter Defense: Virtual tripwire alerts pushed to mobile when boundaries are crossed after hours.
LPR & Face Recognition: Logging of vehicles and personnel for efficient event retrieval.
Behavior Detection: specialized detection for forklift speeding or missing safety gear.

3.title: Global Remote Access
items: Smooth Playback: Cloud optimization allows smooth viewing from headquarters in China.
Centralized Platform: Aggregate feeds from multiple US warehouses onto a single dashboard.
Extended Storage: 30/60/90 day local storage configurations to meet insurance requirements.

4.title: Compliance & Maintenance
items: Privacy Compliance: Camera positioning strictly following US privacy laws.
Access Integration: Automatic video snapshots upon access card swipes.
Regular Maintenance: On-site cleaning, angle adjustment, and firmware upgrades.

lighting.title: Industrial Lighting & Power
lighting.desc: Optimize operational environments and significantly reduce warehouse energy consumption.

1.title: Lighting Upgrade
items: LED Retrofit: Replace old HID/Fluorescent fixtures with High-Bay LEDs (60%+ energy savings).
Smart Sensors: Motion and daylight harvesting sensors to auto-dim/off when areas are vacant.
Emergency Lighting: NFPA 101 compliant exit signs and emergency lights for safe evacuation.

2.title: Power Distribution
items: Production Lines: Dedicated circuits and drops for machinery and packing stations.
Conduit Runs: NEC-compliant EMT/Rigid metal conduit for fire and rodent protection.
Office Power: Cubicle wiring and dedicated UPS circuits for server rooms.

3.title: System Maintenance
items: Panel Upgrades: Load balancing and sub-panel installation for expanded capacity.
Safety Audits: Thermal and insulation testing for aging internal wiring.
Bill Optimization: Power factor correction and usage analysis to lower utility costs.

4.title: Permitting
items: Permit Services: Handling all electrical permit applications with the City to ensure legal construction.
